title: FS: SOLD - T206 Sweet Cap Nap Lajoie (w/ Bat) SGC 3

posts.post_title: FS: SOLD - T206 Sweet Cap Nap Lajoie (w/ Bat) SGC 3
posts.post_content:
SOLD - Very nice card with no creasing. Seems like a "3" is the new "4" these days. Asking for $525 net delivered, PayPal preferred.
